resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107937</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107937</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201020</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Conductivity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leitfähigkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Conductivité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conductivity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conducibilità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγωγιμότητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conductividad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Experiment with conductivity in metals, plastics and photoconductors. See why metals conduct and plastics don't, and why some materials conduct only when you shine a flashlight on them</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experimentieren Sie mit Leitfähigkeit in den 
Metallen, im Plastik und in den Fotoleitern. Sehen Sie, warum 
Metalle leiten und Plastik nicht und warum etwas Materialien leiten, 
nur wenn Sie eine Taschenlampe auf ihnen glänzen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expérimentez avec la conductivité en métaux, 
plastiques et photoconducteurs. Voyez pourquoi les métaux 
conduisent et les plastiques pas , et pourquoi quelques matériaux 
conduisent seulement quand vous polissez une lampe-torche sur eux</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experimente com o conductivity nos metais, nos 
plásticos e nos photoconductors. Veja porque os metais conduzem
e os plásticos não , e porque alguns materiais conduzem somente 
quando você brilhar uma lanterna elétrica neles</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sperimenti con la conducibilità in metalli, 
plastica e fotoconduttori. Veda perchè i metalli conducono e la
plastica non e perchè alcuni materiali conducono soltanto quando 
lucidate una pila su loro</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πείραμα με την αγωγιμότητα στα μέταλλα, τα πλαστικά 
και τους φωτοαγωγούς. Δείτε γιατί η συμπεριφορά 
και τα πλαστικά μετάλλων όχι, και γιατί μερικά υλικά διευθύνουν
μόνο όταν λάμπετε ένας φακός σε τα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimente con conductividad en metales, 
plásticos y photoconductors. Vea porqué los metales conducen y
no lo hacen los plásticos, y porqué algunos materiales conducen 
solamente cuando usted brilla una linterna en ellos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201020</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107937</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/conductivity</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
